title: Login screen won't load
body: So I'm playing on mac and I've never had this problem before with the new client, I'm able to open league but the login screen won't load, its just black, how to fix?

replies.body: A black screen indicates a connection problem failing to download assets, so it seems like something may be going on with your network.  Try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help with that.  Be sure to select Mac for steps specific to you.  Let me know if you have any questions!

When I open my League of Legends the screen comes up but its blank, nothing on it.  Ive downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool and here is what I got when I tried to force a repatch:

Starting
--------
> Getting user profile... Done
  - /Users/Matt
> Creating the "LoL Logs" folder... Done

Running ping test
-----------------
PING www.google.com (173.194.78.104): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 173.194.78.104: icmp_seq=0 ttl=43 time=39.194 ms
64 bytes from 173.194.78.104: icmp_seq=1 ttl=43 time=33.724 ms
64 bytes from 173.194.78.104: icmp_seq=2 ttl=43 time=54.204 ms
64 bytes from 173.194.78.104: icmp_seq=3 ttl=43 time=29.694 ms

--- www.google.com ping statistics ---
4 packets transmitted, 4 packets received, 0.0% packet loss
round-trip min/avg/max/stddev = 29.694/39.204/54.204/9.293 ms

> Saving results to file... Done

Syncing system clock
--------------------
> Resyncing clock... success

Setting DNS to public
---------------------
Finding Network Adapters... Done

> Wi-Fi:
  - Changing Primary DNS to 8.8.8.8
  - Changing Secondary DNS to 8.8.4.4... Done

Flushing DNS... Done

Forcing repatch
---------------
> Finding latest patch... Failed
  /!\ Error: std::exception

These logs don't tell me a whole lot, and the traceroute is not routing to our servers.  When exactly are you getting a black screen?  Have you gone over the entirety of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide?  It's important to go over each instruction to rule out possibilities.  Let me know!

im playing on my windows pc, i played lol without problems but now ,I'm able to open league screen and when i click on launch my screen disapear and never comes back. can anybody help me with my problem?
I too am having problems. I just installed LOL onto my windows desktop and the patcher screen goes black right after it clearly shows the the loading icon. Any particular reason why?

I've had all my pvp and custom games in the past 24 hours crash in this same way. its weird because when the game opens up, the client closes completely instead of minimizing on the dock. Its weird because I was able to do a coop ai game with no trouble, but when in pvp, the moment I jump out of client into loading screen, I get the crash.

Can you clarify what you mean by crash? What happens exactly when you transition from the client to the game loading screen?  Is it just black, does it load it all, or do you get an error message?  Happy to help with some more details!
made a post [earlier](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/lEZcFA3j-crash-loading-screen-client-crash-2nd-night-in-a-row?comment=0000) and had another instance tonight as well.
